title: Aarzoo e Sanam
lines:
Sanam ki aarzoo me rakh diya sar, Dikha de Yaa Khuda Rukhsar e Anwar
 Tere woh Husn ke jalwo ko paane, Tadapta hai mera dil jhilmila kar 
Jo chupna tha tujhe parda me jaakar, Phiraya kyun hame apna bana kar 
Lutaa kar saari Umr jo na paaya, Woh paaya hai teri ulfat ko paa kar
 Ke Saakhi ab hame sarshar kar de, Sharab e Jaam II lallah pila kar
 Sanam ki yaad yaade Haq hai jaano, Kahe Rabbani yeh Yazda ko paa kar
 Ke Aadil bhi hai shaida tera jaana, Mitaa do isko tum apna bana kar

title: Aasi ko Mustafa ne, Dar pe Bula Liya
lines:
Aasi ko Mustafa ne Dar pe Bula Liya, Is Purkhata ki Aapne kismat jaga diya!
 Do boondh ki talab the hame Saakiye Kausar, Wehdat ka Jaam aapne yuhi baha diya!
Arshe Bari pe Hoti hai tazeem Aapki, Dil ko jhuka lo naam e Mohammad Jo AA Gaya!
 Nabiyo ki thi yeh aarzoo ummat ho Aapki, Ummat ko dekho Aapki Aisa Makaa Mila!
Jitne the budd Kaabe me Saare hi gir pade, Aur kankari ko Aapne Kalma padha Diya!
Hai Aashiqo ki jhurmut Gulshan me Aapke, Yazdani Peer ko Aapne sabse juda Kiya!
Aadil tu bhi to naaz kar kismat pe teri, Tujh ko Jamale Yaar ka naqsha bana diya!

title: Aap se pehle hamara
lines:
Aap se pehle hamara... Sarwara koi nahi, Zindagi me aap jaisa... Rehnuma koi nahi
 Durr tujhse reh ke bhi... aye hum nasheen aye Jaane Jaan, Jisko pujaa hai Sadaa... woh tu hai aur koi nahi
 Yaar ke Sang jo bitaa... woh waqt bhi kya tha haseen, Aaj bhi maqsad hamara... dusra koi nahi
 Mujh mareez e Ishq ko... jisne bhi dekha yeh kaha, Hai Sanam iski dawa... aur dusra koi nahi
 Main bhi hu hairaan ke kaise... tera rang yeh chad gaya, Jiski ki nazre Inayat... tu hai woh koi nahi
 Darr Haqiqat aur bhi... humne Haseen dekhe magar, Meri nazron me jache woh... Dilruba koi nahi
 Hai badi uljhan me Aadil... isko suljhao zara, Khud me bhi to tujh ko paaya... dusra koi nahi

title: Aap se pehle hamara
lines:
Aap se pehle hamara... Sarwara koi nahi, Zindagi me aap jaisa... Rehnuma koi nahi
 Durr tujhse reh ke bhi... aye hum nasheen aye Jaane Jaan, Jisko pujaa hai Sadaa... woh tu hai aur koi nahi
 Yaar ke Sang jo bitaa... woh waqt bhi kya tha haseen, Aaj bhi maqsad hamara... dusra koi nahi
 Mujh mareez e Ishq ko... jisne bhi dekha yeh kaha, Hai Sanam iski dawa... aur dusra koi nahi
 Main bhi hu hairaan ke kaise... tera rang yeh chad gaya, Jiski ki nazre Inayat... tu hai woh koi nahi
 Darr Haqiqat aur bhi... humne Haseen dekhe magar, Meri nazron me jache woh... Dilruba koi nahi
 Hai badi uljhan me Aadil... isko suljhao zara, Khud me bhi to tujh ko paaya... dusra koi nahi

title: Aye Aashiqo Ke Rehbar
lines:
Dil yeh fida hai tumpar Aye Aashiqo Ke Rehbar, Yeh Jaan hai nichawar Aye Aashiqo Ke Rehbar
 Husno Jamal me Yakta Mere Sanam Tumhi ho, Tumse Na koi paaya Aye Aashiqe Payambar
Jaam e fanaa bekhud Humko Bhi pila Saaqi, Wo mast tere nain Jaise hai Hawze Kawsar
Khush ho rahe hai Yazda kya hai Haseen Manzar, Rabbani Peer Ki bhi Kardo Lehed Munawwar
Lab par ho zikr tera Tasweer bane Dil me, Aur rooh bhi ho Roshan Aisa Karam ho humpar
 Rakhna Bharam aye Murshid Aadil Ki Aarzoo Ka, Waqt e Nazaa Jo Aaye Deedar ho Mayassar

title: Dil Deewana Peer-e-Rabbani Ka hai
lines:
Dil deewana Peer-e-Rabbani Ka hai, Ye Gharana Peer-e-Rabbani ka hai
 Barse hai Rehmat Ki Barish Subho Shaam, Aashiyana Peer-e-Rabbani Ka hai
 Yazda hi Yazda pukaro har Ghadi, Yeh tarana Peer-e-Rabbani Ka hai
Inke Gulamo se koi takrae to, Woh Nishana Peer-e-Rabbani Ka hai
Shaad hai unke Gulam Aabad hai, Faiz jaari Peer-e-Rabbani Ka hai
Naaz Kar Kismat pe apni Naaz Kar, Yeh Gharana Peer-e-Rabbani Ka hai
Aadil pe jo jae ab nazre Karam, Yeh Gadaa Peer-e-Rabbani Ka hai

title: Dil Ye Shaida Peer-E Yazdani Pe Hai
lines:
Dil Ye Shaida Peer-E Yazdani Pe Hai, Iska Kehna Peer-E Yazdani Se Hai
 Hai Yeh Bus Tumpe Fida Ye Jaan lo... Koi Nahi Tumre Siwa Ye Jaanlo, Ab Kaha Jaye Yeh Tumko Chodke, Ab Yahi Kehna hai Iska Shor Se
 Peer Yazdani Ko Hai Dekhna, Hai Khuda Aur Nabi Ko Dekhna
 Nain bhi tarsat hai tumri deed ko, Na hi todo aap yeh umeed ko, Ab bohot muddat hui hai eid ko, Jalwa dikhla dijiye jo ho so ho
 Peer Yazdani Ko Hai Dekhna, Hai Khuda Aur Nabi Ko Dekhna
Aapki ulfat me guzre zindagi, Ho yahi meri talab ab aakhri, Aap se hi aap ko hai mangna, Hai yehi meri dua sunle sada
 Peer Yazdani Ko Hai Dekhna, Hai Khuda Aur Nabi Ko Dekhna
 Nakshe Paaye Yaar pe jab ho jabi, Hai urooje Bandagi woh har ghadi, Aadil Ki hai Sajdagah Chaukhat teri, Ho ata Aaka Mere Rangat Teri
 Peer Yazdani Ko Hai Dekhna, Hai Khuda Aur Nabi Ko Dekhna

title: Dum Ba Dum Yehi Zikr
lines:
Dum Ba Dum Yehi Zikr Hona, Allah Bhi Hona Muhammad Bhi Hona Jo Bhi Hona So Hona, Bus Mere Yazda Ka Saath Hona.
 Tum bhi Hona Mein Bhi Hona, Illahllah Ban Ke Muhammed Hona, Jo Bhi Hona Jidhar Bhi Hona, Pehle Yaha Hona Phir Waha Hona
 Muhammed Bhi Hona Ali Bhi Hona, Fatima Wa Hassan Hussain Hona, Sab Hona To Hona Magar, Har Jaa Tu Mere Saath Hona
 Madaar Ka Jalwa Bhi Hona, Ghouse Bhi Hona Khawaja Bhi Hona, Madaar Ghous wa Khawaja Banke, Yazdani Allah Hai Allah Hona
 Daana Dekh Ko Nadaan Hona, Gandum Kha Kar Bahaar Hona, Bahaar Ho Kar Khud Mein Khona, Daana Hona Nadaan Na Hona
 Mila Hua Tha Juda Hona, Juda Hokar Mila Hona, Khud Hi Mein Khokar Khuda Hona, Fanna Hokar Bakaa Hona
 Hum Naam Ho Kar Gum Naam Hona, Mai Nahi Janta Mera Kya Hona, Hona To Fakat Itna Hona, Yazdani Ke Kadmo Mein Rabbani Khaak Hona

title: Ek Jaam in Aakho se Piladena Saakhia
lines:
Ek Jaam in Aakho se Piladena Saakhiya, Mast Madhosh Apna Banadena Saakhiya
 Ke Nasha Umr bhar Rahe Tere Paymane Ka, Itne ehsaan mujhpe Kardena Saakhiya
Teri Ulfat me guzre ye umr bhi meri, Zindagi se bekhabar Kardena Saakhiya
Jaha Utthe Nazar bus ho tu hi tu ho saamne, Bus itnisi he ilteja Sunlena Saakhiya
 Teri Khushbo se mehekti rahe ye zindagi meri, Meri Rage Gulu me bus Jaana Saakhiya
 Anjuman e Rabbani me Kubool Karke Mujhe, Tujh me Khone Ka hunar dedena Saakhiya
 Tumko he waasta Yazdani piya ka, Aadil ko bhi Kadmo me Jaga dena Saakhiya!

title: Fakat Teri Mohobbat
lines:
Fakat Teri Mohobbat... He Hai Sanad E Rehai Meri, Mein To Behunaar Hu... Bus Teri Nisbat Hai Badayi Meri,
 Na hai talabe duniya... Na hain mal o zarr ki haajat, Tere kuche ki gulami hai BadShahi meri,
 Main jidhar dekhtha hu ab Nazar tu hi aata hai, Tere ishq me is qadr Badal chuki hai benai meri,
 Aaj mukhalifat par ja utar aae hai... Woh apne hai mere, Bura kya khaak hoga mera Jab Tu Chahta hai bhalai meri
 Farishte bhi pesh aaenge Bohot narmi se mujhse, Mere shijre me jab dekhenge ke tujh tak hai rasai meri
 Aadil ko kyu ho bhala Ab khoufe Jahannam, Khuda ke saame jab woh Denge gawahi meri

title: Guru Kirtan
lines:
Har pal tu Guru ka dekhan jaa, Guru Sab se nirala hota hai, Dekhan Dekhan jab umr kate, Ishwar ka nazara hota hai
 Bhakti tu Guru ki karta jaa, Sewa me Guru ki tu aaja, Jo Guru Sharnan me aa jae, Ishwar ki Sharan me hota hai
 Hirdey me Guru ka naam japo, Charnan me Guru ke seesz dharo, Jo Guru tumhara ho jae, Ishwar bhi tumhara hota hai
 Rang chod tu saare duniya ke, Rang jaa tu Guru ke hi rang me, Jo Guru ka pyara ho jae, Ishwar ka bhi pyara hota hai
 Har pal jo Guru ka dhyan kare, Ishwar bhi usi ka dhyan kare, Aye bande Guru ke hi bhitar, Ishwar ka darshan hota hai
 Hai Guru hi apna Man mohan, Hai saare dukho ka woh marham, Aadil duniya aur mehshar me, Guru hi to sahara hota hai

title: Har Zarre me Khuda hai
lines:
Har Zarre me Khuda hai Mujhe Maloom na tha, Saara aalam uska Pata hai Mujhe Maloom na tha!
 Laa Sharik hai woh Jaano Phir bhi Sharik hai yeh Samjho, Nah Nu Aqrab me Chupa hai Yaar Mujhe Maloom na tha!
Khud Ke Rehne Ki Khatir Yeh mitti ka Ghar Banaya hai, Yeh usi Ki Zinda Mazaar hai Mujhe Maloom na tha!
Hawwa Ko Banaya Parde me Aur Khud bhi chupa hai parde me, Parde Ka ye raaz kya hai Mujhe Maloom na tha!
Aashiq ho Kar Khud hi Mashooq bana wo Khud, Apne hi jalwo pe wo fida hai Mujhe Maloom na tha!
Aabey Hayaat Ka yeh Moti Mujhme hi tha Chupa, Ratan Ka yeh Kya Raaz hai Mujhe Maloom Na tha!
Ishara Karke 'Yadullahe Fauka Ayde him' Ka Usne, Murshid Ka Chola Pehenkar woh Chala hai Mujhe Maloom na tha!
 Buth Khana wa Kaaba Har jagah usko dekha humne, Bismillah Ke Jalwo me Yazdani Chupa tha Mujhe Maloom na tha!
Ab Kya Kahoge Rabbani Munawwar Ki Jalwagari dekh Kar, Sanam Mera Sabse Juda hai Mujhe Maloom na tha!

title: Husn E Yaar
lines:
Husn E Yaar Mein Kya Khoob Nazara Dekha, Peer Yazdani Ke Chehre Ka Ishara Dekha
 Ishq Mein Jo Bhi Duba... Usko Ubharte Dekha, Tere Jalwo Mein Kitno... Ko Hi Marte Dekha
 Yu To Kehne Ko To Hai Lakhon Haseen Duniya Mein, Meri Nazro Ne To Yeh Husn Nirala Dekha
 Peer E Rabbani Tera Hoga Chiraaga Har Dum, Kyun ke Yazda Ka Karam Tujhpe Nirala Dekha
 Ho Munawwar Ab Aadil Bhi Sadke Mein Tere, Humne Kitno Ko Tere Darr Se Sawarte Dekha

title: La Ilaha ka khulasa Peer me hai
lines:
La Ilaha ka… khulasa Peer me hai, Aur Rasool e… Khuda bhi Peer me hai
 Haq ki tasveer Mustafa ka jamaal, Noor e Khairul waraa Peer me hai
 Rang e Hasnain aur Maula bhi, Panjatan ki bahar Peer me hai
 Kalma padna nahi samajh na hai, Iska Irfaa chupa Peer me hai
 Kis jagah jae tumko chod ke hum, Dono Aalam numah Peer me hai
 Yaar ki nazron se piye jao, Maiy Tahura ka raaz Peer me hai
 Lakh sajdo se kuch nahi haasil, Bandagi ka khumar Peer me hai
 Kaise Aadil tu yeh bataega, Tera Dil aur Jaan Peer me hai

title: Log puchte hai mujhse
lines:
Log puchte hai mujhse kaisi teri yeh baat hai, Main to adna sa gadaa hu, tu meri pehchan hai
 Kar nawazish aysi ke tera hi ban jau sada, Dhadkano me bhi samaa jaa ab yehi armaan hai
 Ho hi jaati hai khatay, rakh hi lete hai bharam, Yeh teri banda-nawazi ka alag andaaz hai
 Jis tarah tumne rakha hai Is zamane me bharam, Hashr me bhi tum nibhana, tumse hi to aas hai
 Yeh jo shohrat do jahaan me mil rahi sadka tera, Sab teri lutfo inayat sab tera ehsaan hai
 Kya karu mai aysi pee ke, jisme main jinda rahe, Woh pilaa main na rahu, bas teri hi har baat hai
 Sadke tere chal rahi hai Aadil ki bhi thodi bohot, Yeh karam tera hai Aaqaa, Yeh teri khairaat hai

title: Jalwa hai jab woh Char soo
lines:
Jalwa hai jab woh Char soo, Phir bhi Chupa hua hai Kyun, Zahid Khuda Ko dhund tu, Mera Khuda ho Ru-Baru!
 Nadaan hai jo Dhundte, Haq ka Pata Waha Yaha, Khud me Khuda Ko dekh le, Rehta hai is Makaa me woh!
Na Samjho ise tum Khak wa Aag, Ek Noor ka hai yeh Makaan, Darwaze is ke Saath hai, Do Khidki se Jhakta Khuda!
Khud Ka Pata Mila Mujhe, Deedar Shah Peer Se, Meeraj e bandagi hui, Jisne Sanam Ko Paaliya!
Bismillah Shah Peer ne, Jaam e maiy Pila diya, Apna bana ke Rabbani ko, Munawwar Sanam bana diya!

title: Kya Khoob Sandal hai
lines:
Kya Khoob Sandal hai Mere Aye Peer-e-Rabbani tera, Sadqa Baate Panjatan Ka Peer-e-Yazdani tera
 Kya Khoob Chaadar hai teri Yazda piya ladle, Rang Hasnaini hai isme Aur hai Noorani fiza
Deedar Shah Bhi aaye hai Bismil piya bhi hai Yaha, Auliya Ki Anjuman me bol bala hai tera!
Nisbat e Rozekari Ka hai Ka hai yeh faiz Rawa, Sadqe me Deedar Shah Ka Banda Nawaz bhi Yaha!
Aashiqo Ki Dhoom hai Aur Aarifo Ka hai Guzar, Noor Ki baarish yaha pe Aur hai noorani Samaa!
Jholi Bhardo Sabki aaj Jitne hai Saahil Khade, Sadke me Dada Madaar Kardo Sabka beda Paar
Tere Aastan pe barse Noor Ki Baarish Sadaa, Humpe bhi pad jae Chitte Sadke me Yazda piya
Har Ghadi Rakhna Bharam Aadil Ka Rabbani Piya, Tere dum pe Khub Itrata phire Adna Gulam!

title: Mehboob-e-Qibriya
lines:
Aalam Ke hai jo rehnuma Mehboob-e-Qibriya, Sadke me jinke do jahan Mehboob-e-Qibriya!
 Tumho Zahoore Kainaat Tum jo Saraapa Noor, Haq bhi Kahe tumko Salaam Mehboob-e-Qibriya!
Sab Ambiya me Aapka bala hai Martaba, Saare hi hai tumpare fida Mehboob-e-Qibriya
Meeraj pe the jab Nabi Yeh Shaan dekh Kar, Huro Malak ne di Sada Mehboob-e-Qibriya
Mutthi me Kankari ne bhi Kalma hai padh liya, Dum me bhi ho yehi Sada Mehboob-e-Qibriya
Ab to hame bhi deed ho Muddad hui Huzoor, Sadke Shaheed-e-Karbala Mehboob-e-Qibriya
Zikr-e-Rasool-e-Qaynaat Bakshish Ke hai Sabab, Aadil bhi hai Pashemaan Mehboob-e-Qibriya!

title: Mere Aakaa Peer Rabbani
lines:
Tere hi Kadmo se to lage hai, Mere Aaka Peer Rabbani, Tere hi Jalwo pe Marr mite hai, Mere Aaka Peer Rabbani
 Tere hi Ishq mein doob jaana, Tujhme samaa Ke khud ko Banana, Aisa hunar ab to humko ata kar, Mere Aaka Peer Rabbani
 Aap Yazda ke Raaj dulare, Apna Jeewan Unpe Waare, Tum Yazda ke Aakhon ke Taare, Mere Aaka Peer Rabbani
 Tere Bina Ab na Jeena Gawara, Aa Bhagwan Ab Mandir Mein Aaja, Pooja Karenge Paiya Padege, Mere Aaka Peer Rabbani
 Tere Hi Dum se Yeh Zindagi Hai, Tu Jo Nahi To Kuch Bhi Nahi Hai, Aadil Ko Bhi Tumhi Nibhana, Mere Aaka Peer Rabbani

title: Mere Peer hai Rabbani Piya
lines:
Ke Mere Peer hai... Rabbani Piya, Noor e Tanveer hai Rabbani Piya!
 Peer e Yazda Ki Maiy Jisme hai, Woh Paymana hai Rabbani Piya!
Humko bhi Kar ataa woh Ishq Ka Jaam, Jo piya Tune Rabbani Piya!
Koi aur Rang na Chade humpar, Tera hi Rang ho Rabbani Piya!
 Peer Bismillah Ko Naaz hai Jispar, Woh Munawwar hai Rabbani Piya!
Bandagi ke Mere har Aalam Me, Justuju teri Rabbani Piya!
Jisne Khole hai Qalb Ke Taale, Aisi Kunji hai Rabbani Piya!
Laaj Aadil Ki tere Haath me hai, Ho na Ruswai Rabbani Piya!

title: Mera Hussain hai
lines:
Karbal me ghar lutaya woh, Mera Hussain hai, Sajde me sarr kataya woh, Mera Hussain hai
 Jinn ke liye Rasool ne, 'Minal Hussain' kaha, Aysi azeem zaat woh, Mera Hussain hai
 Doshe payambari pe aap, Sajde hue hai tool, Jinki sawaari ho Nabi, woh Mera Hussain hai
 Sab ambiya ne deen ka, Paigam laaye hai, Jo deen banke aaya woh, Mera Hussain hai
 Abbas(as) ki wafa ne, Aylaan kar diya, Sab se buland makaam woh, Mera Hussain hai
 Aashique hue zamane ke, Har daur me magar, Jiski na ho misaal woh, Mera Hussain hai
 Hum aasiyo ko hashr me, Kiski nijaat hai, Yazdani Peer ne keh diya, Mera Hussain hai
 Kyun khauf se gazarti hai, Aadil teri hayaat, Mushkil khusha jahaan ka, Mera Hussain hai

title: Meri zindagi me hidayat na hoti
lines:
Meri zindagi me hidayat na hoti... Tere Ishq ki gar inayat na hoti
 Na hota jahaan me aisa guzara... Tere zikr ki gar Qayadat na hoti
 Jo Teri Mohabbat me hum na pighalte... To Rahe bakaa ki Shanaqat na hoti
 Hai jiski nazar me hama waqt Jaana... Koi isse badkar Ibadat na hoti
 Rahu na mai baaki jo tu hi rahe to... To phir zindagi se Shikayat na hoti
 Jo Ulfat me unki tadapta hai Aadil... Kisi aur ki ab jarurat na hoti

title: Munawwar Ali Ka
lines:
Ye dil hai Deewana Munawwar Ali Ka, Hai Yazda Gharana Munawwar Ali Ka!
 Mila wasta Gaus se bhi hai Nisbat, Hai Shijra Suhana Munawwar Ali ka
Markaze Qadri hind me hai woh Roshan, Jo hai Aastana Munawwar Ali Ka
Barasti hai Rehmat Ki barish Jhamajham,Yeh hai Aashiyana Munawwar Ali Ka
 Main Kyun Gair Ke dar pe daman pasaru, Rawa hai Khazana Munawwar Ali Ka
Agar Kurbe Maula Ki Khwaish hai tujhko,                                                   Padhe jaa tarana Munawwar Ali Ka
Khuda bhi hai unka Khudai bhi Unki, Hai Saara Zamana Munawwar Ali Ka
Jo Unke Gulamo se Uljhega Faizan,      Banega Nishana Munawwar Ali Ka!!!

title: Mohammed Mustafa Ki Shaan
lines:
Mohammed Mustafa Ki Shaan... Kya hai Yeh Khuda Jaane, Bazahir hai to yeh Mehboob... Haqeekat me Khuda Jaane
 Juda Kab hai Mohammed se Khuda Yeh... dekh deewane, Ke kalme me bhi hai wo Saath, Shane Mehboob Kya Jaane!
 Moheeb hai aur wohi Mehboob-e-Khuda... hai aur Mohammed bhi, Ahad hokar bana Ahmed... Haqeekat uski Kya Jaane!
 Tadap ta hai mera dil Inke Jalwo... Ki Jhalak paane, Bula lo rehmate aalam... Hame bhi deedar ho Jae
 Ke Saare Rindo Ke Aaqa tumhi ho... Saakiye Kausar, Pilao Jaam ek aisa... Ke Jisse hum khuda Jaane!
 Mohammed Ko Mohammed ne Bulaya... tha Shabe-Meeraj, Na Samjhega Koi yeh baat... Raaz iska Khuda Jaane!
 Sajake Apne dum ko kar Chiraga... Apne dil me tu, Nahi Samjhe ise Nadaan... ise ahle Samajh Jaane
 Mohammed Ki Shabahat hai Mere... Sarkaar Yazdaani, Sanam itna haseen hai woh... Makaam unka Khuda Jaane!
 Mere Aaqa Mere Maula Mere Murshid... Mere Jaana, Bujha so Rabbani Ki pyas... Ke ho Meeraj-e-Irfani!

title: Rabbani Peer Hamare
lines:
Hum dukhiyo Ke Sahare, Rabbani Peer hamare, Yazda Ke Raaj Dulhare, Rabbani Peer hamare
 Yazda Ki Aakhon Ke taare, Deedar Shah Ke Pyare, Bismillah Shah Ne Saware, Rabbani Peer Hamare
Tumse Ye Qalb hai Roshan, Tumpe fida mera Tan Mann, Kalme Ki Kal dene wale, Rabbbai Peer hamare
Saas Ke taar Bajale, Qalbo jigaar Ko sajale, Apne Piya Ko manale, Rabbani Peer hamare
Ishq me tere jilana, Fanaa Aur Bakaa Samjhana, O noori Chehre waale, Rabbani Peer hamare
Bigda Naseeba jagao, Kadmo se apne lagao, Sabke yehi hai fasane, Rabbani peer hamare
Aadil tu ho inpe Shaida, Ho jaiga tu 'Munawwar', Tasweer inki Sajale, Rabbani peer hamare!

title: Salaam
lines:
Salaam Lelo Ay Peer E Yazda , Khade Hai Humsab Salaam Lelo, Hum Bekaso Ka Tumhi Sahaara, Khade Hai Hum Sab Salaam Lelo
 Ke Hai Jhalak Tum Mein Mustafa Ki, Ke Hai Chamak Tum Mein Khud Khuda Ki, Tumho Sarapa E Noor E Ahmed, Khade Hai Hum Sab Salaam Lelo
 Ke Tumho Saakhi Hamare Yazda, Pilao Kuch Aisa Jaam E Irfaan, Nasha Rahe Jiska Taa Qayamat, Khade Hai Hum Sab Salaam Lelo
 Tumhara Mangta Hu Mere Aaqa, Suno Dua E Meri Khudaara, Lagalo Kadmo Se Apne Mujhko, Khade Hai Hum Sab Salaam Lelo
 Yahi Hai Chahat Yahi Hai Hasrat, Rahe Salamat Tumhaari Nisbat, Yahi Sahara Hai Do Jaha Mein Khade Hai Hum Sab Salaam Lelo
 Ye Hai Gulistaan Peer E Yazda, Rahega Yuhi Jo Taa Qayamat, Ke Is Chaman Se Rabbani Bhi hai, Khade Hai Hum Sab Salaam Lelo

title: Sanam ki Deed me nazro
lines:
Sanam ki Deed me nazro ko tu Sarshar rehne de, Usii ke zikr se hi Qalb ko bedaar rehne de
 Zamane ki mohabbat se mujhe bezar rehne de, Tu apne hi tafakkur me mujhe har baar rehne de
 Tu apni zaat me aisa basaa le apne Murshid ko
 Rahe na ab koi baaki faqat Dildaar rehne de
 Koi Masjid ke rukh jae kisi ka Maikada manzil, Meri Manzil ko kadmo me tere Sarkar rehne de
 Ke humne aur bhi Saakhi Sanam khano me dekha hai, Magar meri nigaho me tera rukhsar rehne de
 Yeh tera hai karam teri inayat se mere jaana, tujhi ko paa liya hai ab tera Haqdar rehne de
 Jo paana hai agar Haq ko to paa lo apne Murshid ko, Ke Aadil bhi kare tasdeeq aur Iqrar rehne de

title: Surat Pe Balhaari
lines:
Tori Surat pe Balhaari Morey Daata Yazdani, 
 Tumko Paane Kar Kar Bahane, Yeh Saari Duniya Haari
 Tere Aaneke Khatir Meine, Palkho Ko Apne Bichali
 Bal Bal Jau Nach Nach Jau, Shah E Yazda Ki Aaayi Sawaari
Sajh Dahj Ke Mein Nach Nach Ke Mein, Yazda Piya Ko Manali 
Rabbani Ko Tumne Munawwar Karke, Dono Aalam Mein Azmat Badali
 Aadil Mein Aatu Ab Bus Jaa Tu, Mann Mandir Maine Banali

title: Tere Ishq me Mubtila Mujh ko kar de
lines:
Tere Ishq me Mubtila Mujh ko kar de, Yeh raahe fanaa me baqaa mujh ko kar de
 Tere hi hai charche har ek simt jaana, Tere raaste ka pataa mujh ko kar de
 Khabar na rahe mujh ko duniya jahaan ki, Tere qurb se aashna mujh ko kar de
 Nigahe hai bechain tujhe dekhne ko, Munawwar woh jalwa ayaa mujh pe kar de
 Rahe hosh baki na Rindo ko tere, Tere Maikade ki Ziya mujh ko kar de
 Meri zindagi ke har ek marhale me, Tere naqshe paa ka Nishan mujh ko kar de
 Rabbani hai Maikash tere Peer e Yazda, Jo inko pilaya ataa mujh ko kar de
 Hai saare sakhiyon me kamtar hai Aadil, Khudara nigahe karam mujhe pe kar de

title: Ulfat e Peer
lines:
Ulfat me teri humdum is rah me hum aaye, aur kadmo me tere yeh umr guzar jae
 Hai tere karam se hi... duniya hai meri Roshan, Gar tu na mila to phir... yeh duniya ujad jae
 Yeh jaan bhi teri hai... Imaan bhi tujh pe hai, Ab chahe tu jo chahe... woh marzi bana jae
Tu saakhi bane mera... maikhar mai bann jau, is shawk me hi meri... yeh umr guzar jae
 Kaayam rakh mera wazu... daayam ho meri Namaaz, ek lamha juda na rahu... har pal tu nazar aae
 Tere Ishq ko paana hi... ab haasil e Imaan hai, Tera Ishq ho jisko ataa... woh khud hi nikhar jae
 Jo raaz hai kalme ka... kar dena ayaa dil me, Phir jaan ke kalme ko... hum bhi to sawar jae
 Us lamha tu aa jaana... jab koi na kaam aae, Bus deed ho teri Sanam... aur rooh nikal jae
 Har waqt nibhaya hai... Murshid ne mujhe dekho, Aadil bhi saari umr. unke hi Shukr gae...

title: Yaar Ka Jalwa
lines:
Is dil me apne Yaar ka... jalwa basa ke dekho, Ho jaega chiraga... dum ko saja ke dekho
 Mil jaengi yakeenan... rah e bakaa ki manzil, Kadmo me apne Yaar ke... Dil ko jhuka ke dekho
 Nazro se jisne pee hai... usko na hosh aaye, aisi bhi maikashi hai... mere Sanam ki dekho
 Gar ho tumhe hatana... Wehdaniyat ka parda, Ishq me apne Yaar ke... hasti mitaa ke dekho
 Tujh ko bhi wasl honga... gar hai wafa unse, Surat pe apne Yaar ki... Nazre jama ke dekho
 Yazda Madaar mera... daaro madar inn par, Taalib hua to kya hai... pehle Sanam ko dekho
 Rabbani Peer unpar... sab kuch lutaa diye hai, Aadil bhi hai tumhare... Kadmo ki khak dekho

title: Yazda Tu Nirala Hai
lines:
Sab Husn Se Aala Hain, Yazda Tu Nirala Hai, Hai Saare Sanam Lekin, Yazda Tu Nirala Hai
 Surat Teri Irfani, Sirat Teri Rehmaani, Tu Noor Ka Jama Hai, Yazda Tu Nirala Hai,
 Tujhko Mein Khuda Kehdu, Ya Rabbul Ulaa Kehdu, Alfaaz Nahi Milte, Yazda Tu Nirala Hai,
 Tu Apni Karimi Se, Humko Bhi Nibha Lena, Meri Laaj Sharam Tumse, Yazda Tu Nirala Hai,
 Rabbani Se Pucho, Qurbat Mere Yazda Ki, Ye Aashiqe Yazda Hai, Yazda Tu Nirala Hai,
 Aadil Teri Baari Hai, Maikhana E Yazda Mein, Ye Sabko Pilaate Hai, Yazda Tu Nirala Hai
